content.value: Singto Numchok started his music career right after winning the ¬†first Ribbee's Thailand Ukulele Contest. His first single reached the top of the of the Thailand radio charts.

Singto is known as the first popular musician/singer to present ukuleles on stages and in all of his music videos. Singto's easy listening songs and sweet ukulele sound has played an important role in making ukuleles popular in Thailand.
